name: Atomicollider
description:
MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 35!

Your atomic-twin and energy mate has been captured by an evil atom! Fly the dangerous corridors of quantum space to collide and unleash your atomic fury to gain enough energy to break your twin free!

- Wait for particles to turn green to break them and gain their energy. Use triangle power form to break other particles (key: T / pad: triangle)

- Slow down time to get set yourself up for a clean break by shifting to your hex power form (key: H / pad: square)

- Your energy degrades over time

- You'll need to reach 100 energy to break your twin's prison, once you do you you will be ENERGIZED and will have a short time to find the twin atom before you'll need more energy!

- Controls: (best played with controller)

Use T (triangle on PS4) to break green particles

Use H (square on PS4) to shift to time-shift form and slow down time!

Arrow Keys (left joystick) to move.

A game made by César R. Castillo "seizeTheDia" (Programmer), Pedro Medina "polidélico" (Art), and Ri Caragol "ritec" (Music).

Check out more art by Polidélico: http://polidelico.com/

Listen to more of Ri's music here: https://soundcloud.com/ri-caragol

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!
